clues.text: When this man went into business with James A. Bailey, it turned into a real 3-ring circus

2 Greek words meaning "nose-horned" gave us the name of this animal

clues.response: (1 of) Barbara Walters (or Howard K. Smith)

clues.text: 10 years after succeeding Dave Garroway on "Today", he became anchor of the "NBC Nightly News"

rounds.text: John Steinbeck called this "one of the great songs of the world" & wanted the music & lyrics printed in one of his novels
